title: Briyani and the Effect of their long Slumber
content:
The Briyani have been asleep in the ground for at least a thousand years. Their memory of the time before they were put in this slumber is very foggy and they cannot access it easily.

The Briyani [b]know[/b] the original tale of how the world was created. They [b]know[/b] who @[Luna](person:0e1f6b74-918d-4d85-874e-0bd0bce49aa1) is and that she went missing. They [b]know[/b] that the world has been lead by dragons in the past, but they always have been on good terms with them until @[The Draconic War](document:59bb8ea4-4e1f-4d47-9d3b-6761de8ac899) was unleashed. However, they are aware that only a select number of dragons caused this war and not all of them.

The memory of before their sleep can only be access via high level rituals and even then it has a slim chance to work in obtaining the information.
